cells.data:
1. most interesting problem you solved; 
Let me think, I think the most interesting problem I solved is one of  a algorithm problem, which call dungeon game,
In this algorithm problem, The demons had captured the princess  and imprisoned her in the bottom-right corner of a dungeon, and the dungeon is a 2D matrix, and our task goal is find a way from top-left matrix to  through the dungeon to rescue the princess. I spend a ong time to think how to solved this problem from a programming view, , and finally I I use dynamic programming algorithm to sloved this problem.

2. mistake you made before; 
I think the worst mistake I ever made at work was in my first internship, I was given a project to complete in a week.  I understood the project, but I misinterpreted one section.  After completing the project, I was told by my manager that it was done incorrectly.  I really made a mistake by assuming incorrectly in one of the sections instead of asking for clarification.  I learned not to assume through the mistake I made."

3. how do you handle relationship with colleagues
At first  communicate effectively because I think the foundation of every good relationship is solid communication. we also get to know our co-worker.Since one of the best ways to build positive relationships is to make time to learn about people.Be reliable and have a positive attitude, sometimes we need to Cope with conflict.

1. Self-introduction

I am Robin who is a graduate student from Santa clara university, majored in computer science and engineering. My concentration is web development and I am solid in Java andJavascript. I have experience with mean stack development. And I will graduate this march.

 

2. About project

I developed a Vending Machine Monitoring Web Size. It is used to allow employee to register and login, enabled to modify and show all the information about sales and machine. The fronted end use bootstrap jQuery and ejs template, the backend is written in a Nodejs framework expressjs 

The difficult part is the integration part since since there are a lot of modules working together. To conquer it, I read a lot of helper document and talk with my group member for many times. The other difficult part of my project is that I am totally new to it meanwhile few people in our team have experience in it, To conquer it, I tried to find some similar implementation online and finally finish it. When the web site finished, I am so proud of it.

 

 

3.About work

In this work, I am a student research assistant, focusing on the existing remote authentication scheme based on biological characteristics, like fring print and palmprint, and analyzed the safety defects in the scheme, then develop a new blind identity authentication scheme based on palmprint. The scheme can effectively solve issues on user privacy, template protection and trust.
